title: How Do I Counter Nasus
body: The one champion I hate going up against is Nasus, this stupid champ has the most insane late game as he can build full tank and take away half ur health with one Q, he has crazy sustain because he gets life steal from his Q Aswell and u can't run away from him because he has a slow and when you are about to kill him in a 1v5 and 3 of u have already died to him, he ultra and the rest of you die, please tell me how to counter Nasus guys, I need a lot of help.

replies.body: Ganks. Freeze your lane, work with your jungler to stop him farming effectively. Any team/jungler worth their salt will know that Nasus needs to be stopped from just camping top all day. It helps if your other lanes are doing well, so he is forced to come down from top and pop that teleport to help out, thus disrupting his farm. When you're not getting a gank, just harass him from afar to make him miss the odd cs and annoy him.

Armour helps, as does the ability to kite and such, Botrk works wonders against him, and if you cant stunt his ealry game stacking its harder for him to be better in the late game, have your jungler camp your lane if he is the only late game threat and hope for the best.

Because I really do need help against some really strong champs in the meta because I have only been playing league for six months.

Learn how to play Fiora. She shuts down nasus hard. Fight him by poking his vitals with Q and using E afterwards to apply more damage than he can lifesteal out of, and then when you go all-in, wait for him to ult and then hit him with your ult. Use your W to parry his Q's if you're dueling him and you should be able to laugh your way to the nexus.

If you're a range you can try to kite him. 
Vayne, Quinn do relatively well.

notes in general to counter doge in LANE

- do not push the lane, try to have it in the middle or near your tower. Pushing makes it easier for nasus to farm under tower
- play aggressive, but not too aggressive, watch minion agro
- if you're playing ranged, abuse your autos
- don't be passive
